mapper.insert:
insert into ppm_laborhourconfig (guid, standardhour, overloadhour, underloadhour, freezetime, issaveaspersonallog, ismodificationaudithour,
createuserguid, createtime, updateuserguid, updatetime) values (#GUID#, #STANDARDHOUR#, #OVERLOADHOUR#, #UNDERLOADHOUR#, #FREEZETIME#, #ISSAVEASPERSONALLOG#, #ISMODIFICATIONAUDITHOUR#,
#CREATEUSERGUID#, #CURRENTTIME:TIMESTAMP#, #UPDATEUSERGUID#, #CURRENTTIME:TIMESTAMP#)
mapper.update:
update ppm_laborhourconfig
STANDARDHOUR = #STANDARDHOUR#, OVERLOADHOUR = #OVERLOADHOUR#, UNDERLOADHOUR = #UNDERLOADHOUR#, FREEZETIME = #FREEZETIME#, ISSAVEASPERSONALLOG = #ISSAVEASPERSONALLOG#, ISMODIFICATIONAUDITHOUR = #ISMODIFICATIONAUDITHOUR#,
updatetime = #CURRENTTIME:TIMESTAMP#, updateuserguid = #UPDATEUSERGUID#
